attributes.action: Stop the closure of mind grimsby
attributes.additional_details: Mind grimsby provides support groups for adults with learning disabilities and the over 65's who suffer with mental illness, these groups are run 4 days a week. The funding they currently get is going to be stopped, I've set this petition up to try and stop this so these adults will still be able to use the service
attributes.background: People with mental illness attend the groups here, especially the over 65's, if the centre closes they won't be able to attend anymore and for most this is the only support they have

rejection.details:
This decision was taken by North East Lincolnshire's Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG), not the Government or Parliament. 

The CCG has asked anyone who is worried, concerned or would like to talk to someone about the change, to call the customer care  0300 3000 500 or send an email nelccg.askus@nhs.net.

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
